RGBColor
struct
RGBColor

Defines a color in the RGB colorspace. See https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/RGB_color_model for details.  Each color component is in the range of 0 to 255

Members
<uint8 at Caustic::uint8> r

R component

<uint8 at Caustic::uint8> g

G component

<uint8 at Caustic::uint8> b

B component

Header

#include "Imaging/Color/Color.h"
